repair_instructions: Apply split repair clamp or wrap-around collar (wet repair possible). Tighten or replace leaking rubber ring/joint.
Isolate pipe and perform cut-out repair: remove damaged section and install new PVC section with double-socket repair couplings. Ensure solvent-weld or rubber-ring joints re-fitted.
Shut down and replace the full section between the nearest joints. Use spigot-and-socket couplers; disinfect and flush after repair.
Emergency isolation; install bypass line. Excavate and replace full pipe length. Inspect bedding/support to avoid recurrence.
applicable_conditions: multiple cracks over several metres or structural failure
